trans-unit.source: To disable the Two-Factor Authentication, toggle the switch above off and enter a valid one-time password.
trans-unit.target: For at deaktivere to-faktor autentificering, skal du slå switchen ovenfor fra og indtaste en gyldig engangskode.

trans-unit.source: Scan this code with your OTP application (e.g., Google Authenticator).
trans-unit.target: Scan this code with your OTP application (e.g., Google Authenticator).

trans-unit.source: You can also enter the shared secret manually in your OTP application or device.
trans-unit.target: You can also enter the shared secret manually in your OTP application or device.

trans-unit.source: This code should now be displayed on your device or in your application.
trans-unit.target: This code should now be displayed on your device or in your application.

trans-unit.source: To disable the Two-Factor Authentication, enter a valid one-time password and click the DISABLE button.
trans-unit.target: For at deaktivere to-faktor autentificering, skal du indtaste en gyldig engangs adgangskode og klikke på DEAKTIVÉR knappen.

trans-unit.source: Your account is now protected by a two-factor authentication.
trans-unit.target: Din konto er nu beskyttet af en to-faktor godkendelse.

trans-unit.source: You disabled the two-factor authentication for your account.
trans-unit.target: Du har deaktiveret tofaktorgodkendelse for din konto.

trans-unit.source: The given one-time password is invalid or has expired.
trans-unit.target: Den angivne engangs adgangskode er ugyldig eller er udløbet.
